title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Differentiated Learning Design for Advanced Readers' Reading Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can interpret key arguments from multiple perspectives (three or more) by deeply analyzing texts on diverse social topics.
Learners can propose two or more strategies for building empathetic relationships through identity exploration activities based on reading experiences.
Learners can autonomously select at least three books per week and develop reading plans in a blended learning environment combining digital tools and offline discussions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
